name: get_weather_forecast
description: Get weather forecast for a location to help with demand prediction. Weather impacts: Rain/Snow = Higher local rental demand (people avoid public transit), Good weather on holidays = Higher travel demand, Extreme weather = Potential supply chain issues

location.description: City name or location (e.g., 'Los Angeles', 'New York')

days.description: Number of days to forecast (default: 7, max: 16)
